root_causes: The script excludes missing responses from the validation check (uses not missing(...) ) so respondents with missing B4lDKx2_5 will not be flagged though they should be.
Selection logic should flag either missing OR invalid codes; current logic only flags non-missing invalid codes.
instructions: Change the selection condition to include missing values. For example: sel if miss(B4lDKx2_5) or not any(B4lDKx2_5,5,97,98,99).
Ensure the special codes (97, 98, 99) remain treated as acceptable/exempt values as currently coded.
